item.title: Working of the OS
item.description: I will only explain, step by step, what we did, what it does and why we did it. Prerequisites Visual Studio Code Docker Qemu Step 1. Making the Docker Image We need to make a docker image that contains all of the necessary packages we need. For this we make a file named a Dockerfile. In this case we need nasm to compile our assembly code and grub. We can do this as follows:

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hey! I’m a 19 year old undergraduate of Computer Science, currently studying in the National University of Science and Technology, Pakistan. The thought of how computers work and how much you can do with code amazes me. So much power and possibility right at your fingertips. I’ve coded in C++, Python and Java. I’m currently exploring my interests as I’m in the second year of university and atleast I’m sure that frontend is not my thing that’s why you can see that Powered by Hugo at the bottom of the page.
